statements: SELECT * FROM Resorts WHERE resort_name = 'Resort A';
SELECT resort_name, equipment_inventory FROM Resorts WHERE resort_id = '1234';
SELECT resort_name FROM Resorts WHERE maintenance_schedule ILIKE '%monthly%';
SELECT * FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->>'ski' = '10';
SELECT resort_id, resort_name FROM Resorts ORDER BY resort_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_schedule FROM Resorts;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_id, resort_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->>'snowboard' = '5' OR equipment_inventory->>'ski' = '10';
SELECT resort_name FROM Resorts WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%quarterly%' AND equipment_inventory->'ski' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT resort_id, equipment_inventory->>'snowboard' FROM Resorts WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%yearly%';
SELECT DISTINCT resort_name FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->'ski' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT resort_id, resort_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->'pool' IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->'fitness_center' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT resort_id, resort_name FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->'golf' IS NOT NULL AND equipment_inventory->'tennis' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT resort_name, equipment_inventory FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->'hiking' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT resort_id, resort_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->'biking' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Resorts WHERE maintenance_schedule IS NOT NULL;
SELECT resort_name, equipment_inventory FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->>'gym' >= '5';
SELECT resort_id, resort_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->>'pool' = '0';
SELECT * FROM Resorts WHERE equipment_inventory->>'ski' < '5';
SELECT * FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, equipment_inventory FROM Resorts WHERE resort_id = '123456';
SELECT COUNT(resort_id) AS total_resorts FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name FROM Resorts WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%daily%';
SELECT * FROM Resorts ORDER BY resort_name DESC;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_VALUE(equipment_inventory, '$.ski_gear') AS ski_equipment FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM Resorts WHERE maintenance_schedule IS NOT NULL GROUP BY resort_name;
SELECT resort_name, COUNT(resort_id) AS total_equipment FROM Resorts WHERE JSON_LENGTH(equipment_inventory) > 0 GROUP BY resort_name;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_VALUE(equipment_inventory, '$.snowboard_gear') AS snowboard_equipment FROM Resorts WHERE JSON_VALUE(equipment_inventory, '$.snowboard_gear') IS NOT NULL;
SELECT resort_name, equipment_inventory->'$.lift_ropes' AS lift_ropes FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_QUERY(equipment_inventory, '$.snow_gear') AS snow_equipment_json FROM Resorts WHERE JSON_VALUE(equipment_inventory, '$.snow_gear') IS NULL;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(JSON_QUERY(equipment_inventory, '$.ski_gear')) AS total_ski_equipment FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_OBJECT_KEYS(equipment_inventory) AS equipment_categories FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(equipment_inventory, '$.ski_gear[0].name')) AS first_ski_equipment FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_SEARCH(equipment_inventory, 'one', 'snowboard')) AS snowboard_position FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_VALID(equipment_inventory) AS valid_equipment_inventory FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_TYPE(equipment_inventory) AS equipment_inventory_type FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_DEPTH(equipment_inventory) AS equipment_inventory_depth FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_MERGE_PATCH(equipment_inventory, '{"other_equipment":"helmets"}') AS updated_equipment_inventory FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, JSON_REMOVE(equipment_inventory, '$.ski_gear') AS updated_equipment_inventory FROM Resorts;
SELECT * FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, location FROM Resorts;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT resort_name, maintenance_date FROM Resorts JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id;
SELECT resort_name, maintenance_description FROM Resorts JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id;
SELECT Resorts.resort_name, MaintenanceSchedules.maintenance_date FROM Resorts, MaintenanceSchedules WHERE Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id;
SELECT Resorts.resort_name, MaintenanceSchedules.maintenance_date FROM Resorts INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id;
SELECT resort_id, COUNT(*) AS num_maintenances FROM MaintenanceSchedules GROUP BY resort_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT resort_name, MAX(maintenance_date) AS last_maintenance FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name;
SELECT resort_name, AVG(maintenance_date) AS avg_maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name;
SELECT resort_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS num_maintenances FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name;
SELECT resort_name, MIN(maintenance_date) AS first_maintenance FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name;

SELECT resort_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS num_maintenances FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name HAVING COUNT(schedule_id) > 1;
SELECT resort_name, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT resort_name, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%cleaning%';
SELECT resort_name, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%inspection%' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT resort_name, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, location FROM Resorts WHERE location = 'Mountains';
SELECT resort_name, location FROM Resorts WHERE resort_id = 1;
SELECT resort_name, location FROM Resorts WHERE location LIKE '%Mount%';

SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM Resorts JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id WHERE resort_name = 'Mountain Lodge';

SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM Resorts JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT resort_id, resort_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_maintenance_count FROM Resorts LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id GROUP BY resort_id;

SELECT resort_name, location, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_maintenance_count FROM Resorts LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name, location HAVING total_maintenance_count > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Resorts;

SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM Resorts LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%plumbing%';

SELECT resort_name, location, MAX(maintenance_date) AS last_maintenance_date FROM Resorts LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name, location;
SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts WHERE resort_name IN ('Mountain Resort', 'Beach Retreat');
SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts WHERE resort_name = 'Lakeview Lodge' OR location = 'Mountain View';
SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts WHERE resort_name LIKE '%Resort%' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts WHERE resort_name = 'Mountain Chalet' UNION SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts WHERE location = 'Lakefront';
SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts WHERE resort_id IN (SELECT resort_id FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE MONTH(maintenance_date) = 8);
SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts WHERE resort_id = (SELECT resort_id FROM MaintenanceSchedules GROUP BY resort_id HAVING COUNT(schedule_id) > 10);

SELECT resort_name, location, MAX(maintenance_date) AS last_maintenance_date FROM Resorts JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name, location;
SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id WHERE resort_name = 'Ski Haven' OR resort_id = 2;
SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts WHERE resort_id = (SELECT MAX(resort_id) FROM Resorts);
SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts WHERE resort_id = ANY(SELECT resort_id FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE YEAR(maintenance_date) = 2022);

SELECT resort_name, location, maintenance_date FROM Resorts JOIN (SELECT resort_id, MAX(maintenance_date) AS last_maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules GROUP BY resort_id) AS max_dates ON Resorts.resort_id = max_dates.resort_id;
SELECT * FROM Resorts;
SELECT name, location FROM Resorts;
SELECT name, num_rooms FROM Resorts WHERE num_rooms > 100;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT equipment_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentInventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT r.name, m.equipment_type FROM Resorts r JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON r.id = m.resort_id;
SELECT r.name, e.equipment_name FROM Resorts r JOIN EquipmentInventory e ON r.id = e.resort_id;
SELECT r.name, m.technician FROM Resorts r JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON r.id = m.resort_id WHERE m.maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Resorts WHERE manager IS NULL;
SELECT e.equipment_name, e.condition FROM EquipmentInventory e WHERE e.condition = 'good';
SELECT r.name, r.location FROM Resorts r WHERE r.num_rooms IS NOT NULL;
SELECT r.name, r.location FROM Resorts r WHERE r.num_rooms IS NULL;
SELECT r.name, COUNT(m.id) AS num_maintenance FROM Resorts r LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON r.id = m.resort_id GROUP BY r.name;
SELECT r.name, SUM(e.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Resorts r JOIN EquipmentInventory e ON r.id = e.resort_id GROUP BY r.name;
SELECT r.name, AVG(e.quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM Resorts r JOIN EquipmentInventory e ON r.id = e.resort_id GROUP BY r.name;
SELECT r.name, MAX(e.quantity) AS max_quantity FROM Resorts r JOIN EquipmentInventory e ON r.id = e.resort_id GROUP BY r.name;
SELECT r.name, MIN(e.quantity) AS min_quantity FROM Resorts r JOIN EquipmentInventory e ON r.id = e.resort_id GROUP BY r.name;
SELECT r.name, COUNT(DISTINCT m.technician) AS num_technicians FROM Resorts r JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON r.id = m.resort_id GROUP BY r.name;
SELECT * FROM Resorts;
SELECT name, location FROM Resorts WHERE num_rooms > 50;
SELECT id, name, location, manager FROM Resorts WHERE manager IS NOT NULL;
SELECT e.id, e.equipment_type, e.maintenance_date, e.technician, r.name AS resort_name FROM MaintenanceSchedules e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id;
SELECT e.id, e.equipment_name, e.quantity, e.condition, r.name AS resort_name FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id WHERE e.quantity > 0;
SELECT r.name AS resort_name, COUNT(*) AS num_maintenance_schedules FROM MaintenanceSchedules e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id GROUP BY r.name;
SELECT r.name AS resort_name, AVG(e.quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id GROUP BY r.name;
SELECT r.name AS resort_name, MAX(e.maintenance_date) AS latest_maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id GROUP BY r.name;
SELECT r.name AS resort_name, MIN(e.quantity) AS min_quantity FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id WHERE e.condition = 'Good' GROUP BY r.name;
SELECT e.equipment_type, COUNT(*) AS num_schedules FROM MaintenanceSchedules e GROUP BY e.equipment_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT r.location, SUM(e.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id GROUP BY r.location;

SELECT r.name AS resort_name, AVG(e.quantity) AS avg_quantity, MAX(e.quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(e.quantity) AS min_quantity FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id GROUP BY r.name;

SELECT r.name AS resort_name, m.maintenance_date, e.equipment_name, e.condition FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON e.id = m.resort_id WHERE m.technician = 'John Doe';

SELECT r.name AS resort_name, e.equipment_name, e.quantity, e.condition, m.maintenance_date, m.technician FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON e.id = m.resort_id WHERE e.quantity >= 5 AND m.technician != 'Jane Smith';

SELECT r.name AS resort_name, e.equipment_name, e.quantity, e.condition, m.maintenance_date, m.technician FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON e.id = m.resort_id WHERE e.condition = 'Poor' OR m.technician = 'Alice Johnson';

SELECT r.name AS resort_name, e.equipment_name, e.quantity, e.condition, m.maintenance_date, m.technician FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON e.id = m.resort_id WHERE e.condition = 'Damaged' AND m.technician = 'Bob Brown';

SELECT r.name AS resort_name, e.equipment_name, e.quantity, e.condition, m.maintenance_date, m.technician FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON e.id = m.resort_id WHERE e.condition != 'Good' AND m.technician = 'Charlie Davis';

SELECT r.name AS resort_name, e.equipment_name, e.quantity, e.condition, m.maintenance_date, m.technician FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON e.id = m.resort_id WHERE e.quantity < 3 OR m.technician = 'David Wilson';

SELECT r.name AS resort_name, e.equipment_name, e.quantity, e.condition, m.maintenance_date, m.technician FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON e.id = m.resort_id WHERE e.equipment_name LIKE '%ski%';

SELECT r.name AS resort_name, e.equipment_name, e.quantity, e.condition, m.maintenance_date, m.technician FROM EquipmentInventory e INNER JOIN Resorts r ON e.resort_id = r.id INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules m ON e.id = m.resort_id WHERE r.location = 'Mountains' AND e.condition = 'Excellent';
SELECT * FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, location FROM Resorts;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT resort_id, schedule_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentInventory;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM EquipmentInventory;
SELECT * FROM Operations;
SELECT operation_id, operation_name, status FROM Operations;
SELECT resort_name, location, description FROM Resorts INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id;
SELECT resort_name, equipment_name, quantity FROM Resorts INNER JOIN EquipmentInventory ON Resorts.resort_id = EquipmentInventory.resort_id;
SELECT resort_name, operation_name, status FROM Resorts INNER JOIN Operations ON Resorts.resort_id = Operations.resort_id;
SELECT resort_name, location, schedule_date, description FROM Resorts JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id;

SELECT resort_name, equipment_name, quantity, operation_name FROM Resorts JOIN EquipmentInventory ON Resorts.resort_id = EquipmentInventory.resort_id JOIN Operations ON Resorts.resort_id = Operations.resort_id;

SELECT resort_name, location, description, status FROM Resorts JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id JOIN Operations ON Resorts.resort_id = Operations.resort_id;
SELECT * FROM Resorts WHERE resort_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Operations WHERE operation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Resorts WHERE location = 'Mountain';
SELECT * FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT resort_id, resort_name, location FROM Resorts;
SELECT schedule_id, resort_id, schedule_date, description FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT equipment_id, resort_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM EquipmentInventory;
SELECT operation_id, resort_id, operation_name, status FROM Operations;
SELECT resort_id, resort_name, location, schedule_date, description FROM Resorts JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Resorts.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id;
SELECT resort_id, resort_name, location, equipment_name, quantity FROM Resorts JOIN EquipmentInventory ON Resorts.resort_id = EquipmentInventory.resort_id;
SELECT resort_id, resort_name, location, operation_name, status FROM Resorts JOIN Operations ON Resorts.resort_id = Operations.resort_id;
SELECT schedule_id, resort_name, location, schedule_date, description FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id;
SELECT schedule_id, resort_name, location, equipment_name, quantity FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN EquipmentInventory ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = EquipmentInventory.resort_id;
SELECT schedule_id, resort_name, location, operation_name, status FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Operations ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Operations.resort_id;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, resort_name, location FROM EquipmentInventory JOIN Resorts ON EquipmentInventory.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, operation_name, status FROM EquipmentInventory JOIN Operations ON EquipmentInventory.resort_id = Operations.resort_id;
SELECT operation_id, operation_name, status, resort_name, location FROM Operations JOIN Resorts ON Operations.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id;
SELECT operation_id, operation_name, status, equipment_name, quantity FROM Operations JOIN EquipmentInventory ON Operations.resort_id = EquipmentInventory.resort_id;
SELECT operation_id, operation_name, status, schedule_id, schedule_date FROM Operations JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Operations.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id;

SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date, description, resort_name, location, equipment_name, quantity FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id JOIN EquipmentInventory ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = EquipmentInventory.resort_id;

SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date, description, resort_name, location, operation_name, status FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id JOIN Operations ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Operations.resort_id;

SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, resort_name, location, operation_name, status FROM EquipmentInventory JOIN Resorts ON EquipmentInventory.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id JOIN Operations ON EquipmentInventory.resort_id = Operations.resort_id;

SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, operation_name, status, schedule_id, schedule_date, description FROM EquipmentInventory JOIN Operations ON EquipmentInventory.resort_id = Operations.resort_id JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON EquipmentInventory.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id;

SELECT operation_id, operation_name, status, resort_name, location, equipment_name, quantity, schedule_id, schedule_date, description FROM Operations JOIN Resorts ON Operations.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id JOIN EquipmentInventory ON Operations.resort_id = EquipmentInventory.resort_id JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Operations.resort_id = MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id;
SELECT * FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_id, resort_name FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, location FROM Resorts;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT schedule_id, resort_id, schedule_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT resort_id, schedule_date, task_description FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentInventory;
SELECT equipment_id, resort_id, equipment_name FROM EquipmentInventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM EquipmentInventory;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, resort_id, employee_name FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM Employees;
SELECT * FROM Tasks;
SELECT task_id, schedule_id, task_name FROM Tasks;
SELECT schedule_id, task_name, completion_status FROM Tasks;
SELECT t.task_name, e.employee_name FROM Tasks t JOIN MaintenanceSchedules s ON t.schedule_id = s.schedule_id JOIN Employees e ON e.resort_id = s.resort_id;
SELECT r.resort_name, e.employee_name FROM Resorts r JOIN Employees e ON r.resort_id = e.resort_id;
SELECT m.task_description, e.employee_name FROM MaintenanceSchedules m JOIN Employees e ON m.resort_id = e.resort_id;
SELECT t.task_name, i.equipment_name FROM Tasks t JOIN EquipmentInventory i ON t.schedule_id = i.resort_id;
SELECT * FROM Resorts;
SELECT resort_name, location FROM Resorts WHERE resort_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id;
SELECT task_description FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE resort_id = 2;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM Employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT task_name FROM Tasks WHERE completion_status = false;
SELECT resort_name, task_description FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id;
SELECT employee_name, role, resort_name FROM Employees JOIN Resorts ON Employees.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id;
SELECT task_name, completion_status FROM Tasks JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Tasks.schedule_id = MaintenanceSchedules.schedule_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Resorts;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE resort_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM EquipmentInventory;
SELECT resort_name, COUNT(*) FROM Employees JOIN Resorts ON Employees.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name;
SELECT MAX(schedule_date) FROM MaintenanceSchedules;
SELECT MIN(quantity) FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE equipment_name = 'Skis';
SELECT resort_name, SUM(quantity) FROM EquipmentInventory JOIN Resorts ON EquipmentInventory.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name;

SELECT resort_name, task_name, completion_status FROM Tasks JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Tasks.schedule_id = MaintenanceSchedules.schedule_id JOIN Resorts ON MaintenanceSchedules.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id WHERE Resorts.location = 'Mountain';
SELECT employee_name, COUNT(*) FROM Employees WHERE resort_id IN (SELECT resort_id FROM Resorts WHERE location = 'Beach') GROUP BY employee_name;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT resort_name, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM EquipmentInventory JOIN Resorts ON EquipmentInventory.resort_id = Resorts.resort_id GROUP BY resort_name HAVING avg_quantity > 10;
